confirmed_facts: Seoul Dragon City will operate the â€˜Strawberry Studioâ€™ buffet from December 6, 2025 to March 29, 2026 at the 7th floor of the Ibis Styles Ambassador.
The buffet will feature 26 strawberry dessert items and 24 food menu items, including salads with seasonal fruits and vegetables.
The strawberry desserts will use â€˜Seolhyangâ€™ strawberries shipped directly from Nonsan, Chungnam, ensuring high sweetness and freshness.
